specialItems.name: BIOTIC GRASP ENHANCEMENT
specialItems.description: Enhances Moira's Biotic Grasp with improved damage, healing, and resource generation.

specialItems.name: BIOTIC ORB AMPLIFIER
specialItems.description: Improves Moira's Biotic Orbs with increased damage, healing, and duration.

specialItems.name: FADE OPTIMIZER
specialItems.description: Enhances Moira's Fade with increased distance, duration, and reduced cooldown.

powers.title: CELLULAR REGENERATION
powers.description: Moira's healing resource regenerates 25% faster and Biotic Grasp healing lingers for 2 additional seconds.
